Reads info line from specified line and stores information.

Reads information line from specified string and stores its information.

void info_db_write (  FILE *  file  ) 
 

Writes info line to specified CDD file.

Parameters:
file Pointer to file to write information to.
Writes information line to specified file.

Variable Documentation

bool flag_scored = FALSE
 

If this flag is set to a value of 1, it indicates that the current CDD file has been scored and is available for coverage reporting (if CDD file has not been scored, errors will occur when trying to get coverage numbers).

char leading_hierarchy[4096]
 

This string specifies the Verilog hierarchy leading up to the DUT. This value is taken from the -i value (or is a value of '*' if the -t option is only specified).
